Looks like a problem in StyledTextBidi.
Moving to SWT.

The ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException is fixed as part of bug 22060. The first 
integration build the fix is in is 20020806.
I'm not sure that this is the cause of the NPE though. The GridLayout that was 
throwing the NPE may have been left in some bad state because of the 
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in StyledTextBidi.

I can't reproduce the problem with 2.0 on a Hebrew Windows NT. Did you see this 
problem again since you opened this bug?
I will comment this bug if it happens again
Closing. Reopen if you see this again.
